name: .UP File Extension
summary: Learn about .UP files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You should not attempt to open UP files. Instead, the Gracenote system in a Toyota vehicle loads the update saved in the UP file.

You can manually update Gracenote by downloading the UP update files from Toyota's website corresponding to your vehicle model. Then, transfer the files to the connected USB flash drive, disconnect the flash drive, and reconnect it to the vehicle's USB port. For Gracenote to recognize it, you must format the drive to the FAT, FAT16, or FAT32 file systems.
After connecting the flash drive to the vehicle's USB port:
Scroll right and choose the System tab.
Search for and choose the UP update file.
